title: Level 2: Thaa shapes
description: Practice the /th/ sound in isolated, initial, medial, and final forms.
objective: Help children spot the letter Thaa in every position without using full words.

steps.prompt: Hear the /th/ sound. Tap the isolated shape.
steps.hint: Find the letter with three dots on top.

steps.prompt: Hear /th/ at the start. Tap its initial shape.
steps.hint: Look for the leading curve with three dots.
No connectors appear on either side.
Three dots stay on top even in the middle.

steps.prompt: Match the sound to the final /th/ shape.
steps.hint: The tail leans left with three dots above.
Pick the starting curve with three dots.
The isolated form is a single curve with dots.

steps.prompt: Match the audio to the medial /th/ shape.
steps.hint: It connects on both sides and keeps three dots.
Choose the form that finishes with three dots.

steps.prompt: Which option shows /th/ connecting on both sides?
steps.hint: It links on both sides while keeping three dots.

steps.prompt: Spot /th/ with three dots in final form.
steps.hint: The final form ends with a tail and dots.

steps.prompt: Great work practicing the /th/ letter shapes.
